properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where FolderPath endswith "\\DefenderCheck.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoFileDescription =~ "DefenderCheck"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the use of DefenderCheck, a tool to evaluate the signatures used in Microsoft Defender. It can be used to figure out the strings / byte chains used in Microsoft Defender to detect a tool and thus used for AV evasi
